messages.content:
You are an expert coder. Ground rules:
- Follow the user's instructions. 
- DO NOT wrap answers in markdown code blocks, which means no triple backticks like ``` nor single backtick like ` .
- Do not explain answers, just give me code. 
- Never add comments to the end of a line. 
- Never add comments.
- Preserve indentation. 
- If rewriting code, preserve unrelated code. 
- Prefer readable code over of comments.

## General Code Preferences

- When rewriting code, leave unrelated code and unrelated comments as is.
- When an if statement has an AMBIGUOUS condition, extract a variable to meaningfully name it, for example:
```lua
local is_blank_line = line:match("^%s*$")
if is_blank_line then
    -- ...
end
```

# Semantic Grep matches: 3

## ~/repos/github/g0t4/private-auto-edit-suggests/run-ptw-one-test-example.fish:0-6
#!/usr/bin/env fish

# pass pytest args after --
#   make sure the args work with pytest directly
#   pytest ____

ptw --  auto_edit/tests/aligned-tests.py::TestIntegration::test_detect_split_breathing_into_two_silences --capture=no --log-cli-level=INFO


## ~/repos/github/g0t4/private-auto-edit-suggests/run-all-tests.fish:0-4
#!/usr/bin/env fish

# use --capture=no to see print() output
# use --log-cli-level=___ to set pytest's root logger level
ptw auto_edit/**/*.py -- --capture=no --log-cli-level=INFO


## ~/repos/github/g0t4/private-auto-edit-suggests/research/gen_video_frame_numbers.fish:0-10
#!/usr/bin/env fish

set frame_count 500
set fps 25
set duration (math $frame_count / $fps)

ffmpeg -f lavfi -i "color=c=black:s=1920x1080:d=$duration" \
    -vf "drawtext=fontfile=/path/to/font.ttf:fontsize=72:fontcolor=white:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=(h-text_h)/2:text='%{n}':rate=$fps" \
    -frames:v $frame_count -r $fps \
    numbered-$frame_count-fps$fps.mp4
# compliments gpt-4o

wrap paths in ""
Here is code I selected (with carefully preserved indentation) from .config.fish:
abbr ptw_ranges (ptw_path auto_edit/new_silence/ranges_tests.py)
abbr ptw_gaps (ptw_path auto_edit/new_silence/gaps_tests.py)
abbr ptw_detect (ptw_path auto_edit/new_silence/detect_tests.py)
abbr ptw_humanize (ptw_path auto_edit/new_silence/detects/humanize_tests.py)
abbr ptw_all_new (ptw_path auto_edit/new_silence/**/*_tests.py)

abbr ptw_integration (ptw_path auto_edit/new_silence/tests/integration_tests.py)
abbr ptw_integration_one (ptw_path auto_edit/new_silence/tests/integration_tests.py::TestsIntegration::test_detect_split_breathing_into_two_silences)
